The {{Lang|'''Belyi Tsar'''|ru=Белый царь|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Белый Царь}}}} was the first [[Cryo Archon]] of [[Snezhnaya]].<ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref> His still-extant followers are known as the [[Snowland Fae]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{Lang|''Belyi''|ru=Белый|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Белый}}}} means "white" in Russian.
*{{Lang|''Tsar''|ru=Царь|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Царь}}}} means “king” or “emperor” in Russian.
